description: That's right. Reach --your-- /d/zenith/d/. The mechanics of this world are so intricate but powerful to the point you can completely reinvent yourself. The number of /5/enchantments/5/ available is enormous, allowing you to conquer the world.
Do your gardens look a little... short? Well just wait, cause /2/sugarcane/2/, /a/bamboo/a/ and /2/cactus/2/ will grow extremely tall! Limits are boring!
Brewing potions is a great way to get into the spirit of becoming powerful by the power of /b/alchemy/b/! Brew up a storm and have a potion for every day of the week!

Villages will bustle and hum, with so many professions for a villager to ply. They're not the only ones who love to trade. Look out for /3/wandering traders/3/, they might have something special in store for you! Take advantage of this when progressing.

You will spend hours... no, days... no, --months-- adventuring! The quality of /c/rewards/c/ you can obtain from some of the super strong /4/monsters/4/ that appear in the night will make it all worth it in the end.

You can upgrade these rewards with sockets and get special abilities on them. You can use /6/gems/6/ to further augment these --/9/affix/9/-- items. Watch your six, and your one through twelve because you won't know what lurks until it's already too late.
